headline: Is Martin Marietta Materials (MLM) Among the Best Under-The-Radar AI Stocks?
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Everyone’s Talking About As AI Investments Continue. Martin Marietta Materials, Inc. (NYSE:MLM) is one of the stocks analysts were recently talking about. Kathryn Thompson, CEO of Thompson Research Group, said in a latest program on CNBC that she likes MLM amid the company’s AI exposure. Here is why the analyst […]

headline: Assessing Martin Marietta Materials’s (MLM) Valuation After Wells Fargo’s First Analyst Rating and Q3 Earnings Buzz
summary: Wells Fargo just initiated coverage on Martin Marietta Materials (MLM) with an Equal-Weight rating. This marks its first official stance on the stock. Investor interest is also rising as the company gears up to report third-quarter earnings. See our latest analysis for Martin Marietta Materials. Martin Marietta Materials has seen its share price climb steadily this year, with a 23.86% year-to-date return recently pushing shares to $632.38. The momentum has been underpinned by upbeat analyst...
